Services.description: Quality hardware, unbeatable prices, and a shopping experience designed for the modern era.

highQuality.title: High Quality Standards
highQuality.desc: We refuse to compromise. Every product in our catalog is vetted for durability and professional-grade performance.

lowPrice.title: Always Low Price
lowPrice.desc: Direct importer status allows us to cut out middlemen and pass the savings directly to you. Fair pricing, guaranteed.

expert.title: Expert Consultation
expert.desc: Not sure what you need? Our veteran team provides free technical advice to ensure your project succeeds.

Services.waitlist: We are building the most advanced hardware e-commerce platform in Myanmar. Join the waitlist for exclusive early access and launch discounts.

VisionMission.desc: Redefining the standards of hardware and home improvement through innovation, quality, and sustainable practices.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.desc: To be the premier destination for high-quality hardware and home improvement solutions in Myanmar, recognized for our commitment to innovation, sustainability, and customer excellence.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.p1: Provide a comprehensive range of genuine, durable products.
mission.p2: Offer expert advice and exceptional service to every customer.
mission.p3: Contribute to the modernization of Myanmar's infrastructure.

roots.title: Physical Presence
roots.desc: Built on trust with two active physical locations, serving our community personally.

now.title: Digital Evolution
now.desc: Expanding beyond borders. Launching our comprehensive online store in just a few months.

vision.title: The Standard
vision.desc: Premium quality goods at accessible prices. High-end products for every customer.

Testimonials.title: Trusted by Professionals & Homeowners
Testimonials.desc: Don't just take our word for it. Here is what our community has to say about their experience with ThuRain.
Testimonials.t1: The quality of the hardware tools I bought was exceptional. Delivery was fast and the packaging was secure. Highly recommended!
Testimonials.t2: I source most of my decor items from ThuRain. Their collection is unique and modern, perfect for my clients.
Testimonials.t3: Reliable service and great prices. The bulk ordering process is smooth and the team is very responsive.
Testimonials.t4: Love the variety of products! Found everything I needed for my weekend renovation project.

Hero.description: Your trusted partner for premium construction materials and hardware solutions. Operating with excellence for over two decades.
